game.name: Governor of Poker Blackjack
game.description:
Blackjack, also referred as Blackjack 21 or twenty-one, is a widely popular Governor of Poker minigame. In this very simple and fun free online game, your aim is to apply your best card playing skills to win from the dealer. Make sure that you bet chips perfectly and get 21 in the shortest possible time. Do not forget to split the cards if you have the same card values. Check and double down if the moves are going into your favour. No need to bother about getting bankrupt since you are not going to lose the real cash. 

This brand new arcade game will be played against the dealer and AI opponent and your blackjack or poker hands will have 1000 chips to be gambled upon. Get ready to place your bet at the beginning of the game. Gamble as many chips as you desire, however on thing is sure that you will have to restart your game once you lose the ownership on them. All you need to do is apply the standard rules of blackjack. Keep trying to achieve a score of twenty-one of as near to that as possible. 

In addition to this, you can also play poker against other online players to take your card gaming experience to a new level. Adding a unique gameplay, this new Governor of Poker is famous for building on the original Governor of Poker setting. So, what are you waiting for? Set up to the table and get ready to try your luck by placing the best bets of your life today in this best card game for boys and girls! Good luck to play blackjack endlessly in this classical casino card game!
